name: JV-880
description: Roland JV-880 Multi-Timbral Synthesizer emulation. Supports internal patches, performances, and SR-JV80 expansion boards for access to thousands of classic Roland sounds.
post_install: Requires ROM files: jv880_rom1.bin, jv880_rom2.bin, jv880_waverom1.bin, jv880_waverom2.bin in the roms/ directory.
